title: Introduction To The Lagrange Multiplier Method

media:group.media:title: Introduction To The Lagrange Multiplier Method
media:group.media:description:
An introductory video on the use of the Lagrange Multiplier Method to derive the equations of motion for the simple pendulum using a constrained optimization approach.

A COUPLE OF TYPOS TO NOTE:  
The 2nd term of Equation 8 should have a + sign.  It should be + g/l sin Î¸. 
ALSO: 
Equation 20 should read -gy.

Equations of Motion for the Simple Pendulum: 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8VJ1CJ55Np0

Download notes for my other videos:  https://bit.ly/37OH9lX

1:46 Modeling the simple pendulum using Lagrange's equations
